did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: "The Kennedy-Hoffa War" Screenplay by Robert Boris, 1983
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Screenplay entitled "The Kennedy-Hoffa War" by Robert Boris. 474 pages.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Robert Boris is an American screenwriter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a typscript screenplay entitled "The Kennedy-Hoffa War" by Robert Boris. The document appears to be the screenpay for the 1983 television miniseries "Blood Feud," written by Robert Boris and produced by Selznick/Glickman Producions. 474 pages.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: "The Kennedy-Hoffa War" Screenplay by Robert Boris #5785. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
